item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

I know its game day but its beautiful outside. I've been in Boston for a while and STILL haven't walked the Freedom Trail. Sometimes when something is in your back yard, you ignore it until it's too late. I thought it might be nice to meet at Barracuda Tavern on Sunday afternoon and head out to the Boston Common from there and walk the trail. We'll end at USS CONSTITUTION for a quick tour if the group is interested, I have a hook up there, and then grab dinner.

Great day for a good walk, food and good company.

Do you have any fundraising idea? Do you have any volunteering idea? Please share with us during the walk..

You share it..we will execute it!

Thanks

Julien and Phani

The Boston Volunteers
Big Enough to deliver, small enough to care
Learn more:Â www.BostonVolunteer.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Freedom Trail Walk and Free USS Constitution tour with Boston Volunteers
